ZWallet
Hello blank fragment Login Sign Up Login to your existing account to access all the features in Zwallet. Create your account to access Zwallet. Enter your email address Enter your username Enter your password Already have an account? Let’s Already have an account? Let’s Forgot password? Enter your Zwallet e-mail so we can send you a password reset link. Confirm Reset Password Create new password Confirm new password Virtual Account Number We provide you virtual account number for top up via nearest ATM. How to Top-Up Go to the nearest ATM or you can use E-Banking. Type your security number on the ATM or E-Banking.n Select “Transfer” in the menu Type the virtual account number that we provide you at the top. Type the amount of the money you want to top up. Read the summary details. Press transfer / top up. You can see your money in Zwallet within 3 hours. Personal Infomration We got your personal information from the sign up process. If you want to make changes on your information, contact our support. First Name Last Name Verified Email Number Phone
